question.text: Select the correct statement about biodiversity

options.text: The desert areas of Rajasthan and Gujarat have a very high level of desert animal species as well as numerous rare animals
Large scale planting of Bt cotton has no adverse effect on biodiversity
Western Ghats have a very high degree of species richness and endemism
Conservation of biodiversity is just a fad pursued by the developed countries

solution.text:
Western Ghat occur along the Western Coast of India in Maharashtra, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu and Kerala. There is high degree of endemism as well as richness of species of flowering plants, amphibians reptiles, some mammals and butterflies.
$B t$ cotton is insect resistant and thus disturbed the food chain.
